languages.text: {n}Коренным обитателям аркологий не понравилось, что их лишили работы, и они встретили отчаявшихся гостей в штыки. Сципионцам пришлось дать отпор, сплотившись вокруг своих старшин — рабочих бригадиров. Улицы наводнило насилие.{/n}

{n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Коренным обитателям аркологий не понравилось, что их лишили работы, и они встретили отчаявшихся гостей в штыки. Сципионцам пришлось дать отпор, сплотившись вокруг своих старшин — рабочих бригадиров. Улицы наводнило насилие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies did not like the way in which they had been deprived of their jobs and thus had given their desperate guests a hostile welcome. The Scipions had to fight back, rallying behind their elders, the working brigadiers. The streets were awash with violence.{/n}

{n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies did not like the way in which they had been deprived of their jobs and thus had given their desperate guests a hostile welcome. The Scipions had to fight back, rallying behind their elders, the working brigadiers. The streets were awash with violence.{/n}

{n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

{n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their elders, the working brigadiers. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

{n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workforce supervisors. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

{n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

{n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

{n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}巢都原本的居民不希望外来者抢走他们的饭碗。他们开始敌视对那些走投无路的难民，而希皮奥内人也不得不团结在众多领班旗下，对当地人进行反击。巢都街道上充斥着各种各样的暴力事件。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巢都原本的居民不希望外来者抢走他们的饭碗。他们开始敌视对那些走投无路的难民，而希皮奥内人也不得不团结在众多领班旗下，对当地人进行反击。巢都街道上充斥着各种各样的暴力事件。{/n}
{n}巢都原本的居民不希望外来者抢走他们的饭碗。他们开始敌视对那些走投无路的难民，而希皮奥内人也不得不团结在众多领班旗下，对当地人进行反击。巢都街道上充斥着各种各样的暴力事件。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los habitantes locales de las arcologías no estaban muy dispuestos a perder su trabajo y dieron a sus desesperados huéspedes una bienvenida bastante hostil. Los escipiones se vieron obligados a organizar contraataques orquestados por sus líderes, los capataces de los trabajadores. Las calles están plagadas de violencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los habitantes locales de las arcologías no estaban muy dispuestos a perder su trabajo y dieron a sus desesperados huéspedes una bienvenida bastante hostil. Los escipiones se vieron obligados a organizar contraataques orquestados por sus líderes, los capataces de los trabajadores. Las calles están plagadas de violencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アークロジーの地元住民は、仕事を奪われることを従順に受け入れる姿勢を示さず、災難に見舞われた入植者に敵対心を燃やした。サイピオーネの住民は反撃を余儀なくされ、年長者である現役の准将たちの元に結束した。まもなく、街は暴力で溢れかえることとなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アークロジーの地元住民は、仕事を奪われることを従順に受け入れる姿勢を示さず、災難に見舞われた入植者に敵対心を燃やした。サイピオーネの住民は反撃を余儀なくされ、年長者である現役の准将たちの元に結束した。まもなく、街は暴力で溢れかえることとなった。{/n}
{n}アークロジーの地元住民は、仕事を奪われることを従順に受け入れる姿勢を示さず、災難に見舞われた入植者に敵対心を燃やした。サイピオーネの住民は反撃を余儀なくされ、年長者である現役の准将たちの元に結束した。まもなく、街は暴力で溢れかえることとなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les habitants des arcologies n'ont guère apprécié de se voir privés de leurs emplois, accueillant plus que fraîchement ces « invités » désespérés. Les Scipioniens ont ainsi été contraints de riposter, se ralliant derrière leurs chefs d'équipe. Au final, les rues sont la proie de violents combats.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les habitants des arcologies n'ont guère apprécié de se voir privés de leurs emplois, accueillant plus que fraîchement ces « invités » désespérés. Les Scipioniens ont ainsi été contraints de riposter, se ralliant derrière leurs chefs d'équipe. Au final, les rues sont la proie de violents combats.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die örtlichen Bewohner der Arkologien waren nicht erfreut darüber, ihre Arbeitsstellen zu verlieren und hießen ihre verzweifelten Gästen recht feindselig willkommen. Die Scipionen waren gezwungen, sich zu wehren und scharten sich um die Anführer der Arbeiter. Die Straßen werden von Gewalt überzogen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die örtlichen Bewohner der Arkologien waren nicht erfreut darüber, ihre Arbeitsstellen zu verlieren und hießen ihre verzweifelten Gästen recht feindselig willkommen. Die Scipionen waren gezwungen, sich zu wehren und scharten sich um die Anführer der Arbeiter. Die Straßen werden von Gewalt überzogen.{/n}

{n}Die örtlichen Bewohner der Arkologien waren nicht erfreut darüber, ihre Arbeitsstellen zu verlieren, und bereiteten ihren verzweifelten Gästen eine recht feindselige Begrüßung. Die Scipionen waren gezwungen, sich zu wehren. Sie versammelten sich hinter ihren Anführern, den Brigadieren der Arbeiter. Die Straßen werden von Gewalt überzogen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Arkolojilerde yaşayan yerli nüfus, işlerinden mahrum edilmeye hiç de sıcak bakmadı ve biçare konuklarını oldukça hasımca bir tavırla karşıladı. Scipionlular, liderleri olan ustabaşıların arkasında toplanarak karşı saldırıya geçmek zorunda kaldı. Sokaklardan şiddet eylemleri eksik olmadı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants of the arcologies were less than amenable to being deprived of their jobs and gave their desperate guests a rather hostile welcome. The Scipions were forced to fight back, rallying behind their leaders, the workers' foremen. The streets are awash with violence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arkolojilerde yaşayan yerli nüfus, işlerinden mahrum edilmeye hiç de sıcak bakmadı ve biçare konuklarını oldukça hasımca bir tavırla karşıladı. Scipionlular, liderleri olan ustabaşıların arkasında toplanarak karşı saldırıya geçmek zorunda kaldı. Sokaklardan şiddet eylemleri eksik olmadı.{/n}
